text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Skills are an important factor to
winning races. Adding skills doesn't
consume your turns, so make sure to
check and learn them often!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Agreed. If you don't use the skill 
points that you've gained, they'll 
be a complete waste!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
By all means! Choose the skills that
match your horsegirl's abilities and the
requirements of the races she runs!
